qas.question: Beyonce worked with who on her perfumes, True Star and True Star Gold?

What was Beyonce's third perfume named?

context: <a1_0>Beyoncé<a1_0/> has worked with <a0_0>Tommy Hilfiger<a0_0/> for the fragrances True Star (singing a cover version of "Wishing on a Star") and True Star Gold; she also promoted Emporio Armani's <a9_0>Diamonds<a9_0/> fragrance in 2007. Beyoncé launched her first official fragrance, <a2_0><a5_0><a11_0>Heat<a11_0/><a5_0/><a2_0/> in <a10_0>2010.<a10_0/> The commercial, which featured the 1956 song "Fever", was shown after the water shed in the United Kingdom as it begins with an image of Beyoncé appearing to lie naked in a room. In February <a6_0>2011<a6_0/>, Beyoncé launched her second fragrance, Heat Rush. Beyoncé's third fragrance, <a7_0>Pulse<a7_0/>, was launched in September 2011. In <a3_0>2013<a3_0/>, The Mrs. Carter Show Limited Edition version of Heat was released. The <a8_0><a12_0>six<a12_0/> editions<a8_0/> of Heat are the world's best-selling celebrity fragrance line, with sales of over $<a4_0>400 million<a4_0/>.
